mapper.select: SELECT order_num, TO_CHAR(order_datetime, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS order_date , TO_CHAR(transport_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS transport_date, order_total_money, shipping, order_sale, order_point, order_earn, total_amount, u.useridx, u.user_name FROM totalorder o JOIN user1 u ON o.useridx = u.useridx
